data.title: Aggressive Mid Wall Peek
data.description: Cut off A Site from Mid while going for an aggressive peek with this Barrier Orb lineup.

data.title: B Main Slow Orb From B Tunnel
data.description: This is an easy to set up Slow Orb for B Main from B Tunnel that you can do without directly peeking B Main.

data.title: A Cave Entrance Slow Orb From A Bridge
data.description: This is a great Slow Orb for the A Cave Entrance into A Site. Be careful of when you use it however since you are exposed to several angles on A Site when you are in the middle of setting up the lineup.

data.title: Aggressive Sage Wall Boost For Mid Wood Doors
data.description: This is an aggressive Ice Wall boost to peek into Mid Bottom / Mid Pillar from Mid Wood Doors.

data.title: A Metal Doors Ice Wall Head Peek Angle
data.description: This is a great head peek angle into A Hall from behind the open A Metal Door.

data.title: Back B Site Ice Wall Off Angle Boost
data.description: This is a great Sage Wall off angle for B Main and B Tunnel. Be careful though since part of the Ice Wall will be sticking out in view of players in B Tunnel and B Main before they see you - so, you  may have to destroy the part of the wall that is sticking out either by yourself or with the help of a teammate.
